subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Boston Red Sox’ Jon Lester, a 24-year-old left-hander, shut down the Kansas City Royals, 7-0, on Monday night for the first no-hitter in the major leagues this season.
snippet: The Boston Red Sox’ Jon Lester, a 24-year-old left-hander, shut down the Kansas City Royals, 7-0, on Monday night for the first no-hitter in the major leagues this season.
